addRaceDetails.chooseRaceDatesDesc: Choose a start and close date in 24-hour format. Time is in {{timezone}}.
addRaceDetails.chooseRaceTypeDesc: Race types increase in complexity from left to right. For first-time racers, we recommend Time trials because models converge faster.
addRaceDetails.classicRaceDesc: Racers  can submit unlimited models within a date range to climb the leaderboard. Results and videos are viewable on the Leaderboard page.
addRaceDetails.collisionPenaltyDesc: Choose the number of seconds added to a racer's time for collision.
addRaceDetails.communityVisibilityDesc: Races are private. Only racers that are invited to a race can view it. To invite racers to your race, you share a link. Racers you've invited can forward the link to other racers. As the race organizer, you can revoke any racer's permission to race.
addRaceDetails.competitionTracksDesc: Decide what track the racers will compete on
addRaceDetails.description: You can edit these details at anytime until the race starts.
addRaceDetails.errorNameMaxLength: The racing event name has too many characters.
addRaceDetails.errorDescriptionNoMatch: The racing event description must have at least 1 non-whitespace character.
addRaceDetails.liveRaceDesc: Racers  enter their best model prior to the LIVE racing event. During the  event, racers take turns to compete in real-time in the console with  optional interactive speed control. The racer with the fastest single  lap time wins the race.
addRaceDetails.maxSubmissionsPerUser: Max number of submissions per user
addRaceDetails.minimumLapsDesc: Choose the number of laps required for a model to pass evaluation.
addRaceDetails.nameOfRacingEventDesc: The racing event name must be 1 to 64 characters.
addRaceDetails.nameOfRacingEventNoMatch: The racing event name must have at least 1 non-whitespace character.
addRaceDetails.numObjectsDesc: Choose the number of objects a racer must avoid on the track.
addRaceDetails.objectAvoidanceDesc: Complete the fastest lap, skillfully avoiding objects on the track.
addRaceDetails.obstacleDistanceError: Location of obstacles must be at least 13% away from one another.
addRaceDetails.offtrackPenaltyDesc: Choose the number of seconds added to a racer's time for driving off track.
addRaceDetails.openRaceDesc: All racers in your instance can join.
addRaceDetails.percentConstraint: The percentage is less than 7 or greater than 90. Choose a percentage between 7-90
addRaceDetails.placeholder: Summarize the goals and rules of the event for participants.
addRaceDetails.privateRaceDesc: Only racers you invite can join
addRaceDetails.raceDescriptionConstraintText: Racing event description must be 0 to 255 characters.
addRaceDetails.raceDetailsDesc: Compete in a league of your own. Organize a virtual race for friends, colleagues, and school mates.
addRaceDetails.rankingMethodDesc: Choose between Best lap time (the winner is the racer who posts the  fastest lap) or Total time (the winner is the racer with the fastest  overall average).

validationErrors.endDateBeforeStartDate: End date must not be before start date.
validationErrors.endTimeBeforeStartTime: End time must be after start time.
validationErrors.startDateInPast: Start date must not be in the past.
validationErrors.startTimeInPast: Start time must be in the future.
